name: Attack on Titan: The Final Season
description: Eren Yeager joins the Scout Regiment to fight the Titans and uncover the truth behind the Walls...

name: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
description: Yuta Okkotsu, a high school student haunted by a curse, joins Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical College to learn sorcery and control his powers...

name: Tokyo Revengers
description: Takemichi Hanagaki discovers he can travel back in time to prevent the tragic death of his girlfriend and change the future...

name: My Hero Academia Season 6
description: Izuku Midoriya, a quirkless boy, inherits the One For All quirk from All Might and enrolls in U.A. High School to become a hero...

name: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
description: Tanjiro Kamado and his friends board the Infinity Train to investigate the disappearances of demon slayers and confront the powerful demon, Enmu...

name: Black Clover
description: Asta and Yuno, orphans raised in a church, compete to become the Wizard King in a world where magic is everything...

name: One Punch Man Season 3
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, faces new powerful enemies and navigates the Hero Association rankings...

name: Dr. Stone: Stone Wars
description: Senku Ishigami, a genius scientist, uses science to revive humanity after a mysterious phenomenon turns everyone into stone...

name: The Rising of the Shield Hero Season 2
description: Naofumi Iwatani, a hero summoned to another world, continues his journey to protect his world from waves of monsters...

name: AOTU World
description: Luo Xiaohei, a black cat demon with incredible powers, embarks on adventures in the mysterious AOTU World...

name: Horimiya
description: Kyouko Hori and Izumi Miyamura, two high school students with hidden sides, form an unlikely friendship and navigate their relationships...

name: Haikyuu!! To The Top Part 2
description: Shoyo Hinata, a volleyball player with a short stature, aspires to become a top player and leads his team to nationals...

name: Beastars Season 2
description: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, Legoshi, a timid wolf, tries to navigate his feelings and solve mysteries in his school...

name: The Promised Neverland Season 2
description: Emma, Ray, and other children at Grace Field House discover the dark secrets of their orphanage and strive for freedom in a dangerous world...

name: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World Season 2 Part 2
description: Subaru Natsuki, a young man with the ability to return from death, faces new challenges and uncovers mysteries in another world...

name: Fire Force Season 2
description: Shinra Kusakabe, a third-generation pyrokinetic, joins Special Fire Force Company 8 to uncover the truth behind spontaneous human combustion...

name: Attack on Titan Season 4 Part 2
description: Eren Yeager and the Survey Corps engage in a final battle against Marley and uncover the secrets of the Titans and the world...

name: Dorohedoro
description: Caiman, a man transformed into a reptilian creature, hunts sorcerers in the Hole to discover his identity and seek revenge...

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Season 2 Part 2
description: Rimuru Tempest, a slime monster with unique abilities, continues building his nation and facing new threats in the fantasy world...

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Dragon's Judgement
description: Meliodas and the Seven Deadly Sins confront the Ten Commandments and face their ultimate challenges in a battle for Britannia...
